General.Name: 4Front Ventures Corp
General.Description: 4Front Ventures Corp. owns and manages licensed cannabis facilities in state-licensed markets in the United States. The company operates in two segments, THC Cannabis and CBD Wellness. THC Cannabis segment engages in the cultivation, production, manufacturing, and distribution of THC cannabis products to owned dispensaries and third party retailers; and provision of ancillary services. This segment also sells equipment, supplies, and intellectual property to cannabis producers; and leases real estate properties. In addition, it operates dispensaries in the Massachusetts, Illinois, and Michigan primarily under the MISSION brand name. The CBD Wellness segment sells non-THC hemp derived products. 4Front Ventures Corp. was founded in 2011 and is based in Phoenix, Arizona.
General.Address: 5060 North 40th Street, Phoenix, AZ, United States, 85018
